name: SQL
info:
1. SELECT CONCAT(oc_order.firstname, " ", oc_order.lastname) as buyer, oc_order.order_id, oc_order.date_modified as time, oc_order.total as price FROM oc_order;
2. SELECT oc_order_product.name, oc_order_product.quantity, oc_order_option.value, oc_order_product.model FROM `oc_order_product` INNER JOIN oc_order_option ON oc_order_option.order_product_id=oc_order_product.order_product_id WHERE oc_order_product.order_id=5;

name: select
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT CONCAT(oc_order.firstname, \" \", oc_order.lastname) as buyer, oc_order.order_id, oc_order.date_modified as time, oc_order.total as price FROM oc_order;"
return msg;

name: reset
func:
global.set("order", [])
// prd is producing order_id
global.set("prd", undefined)
global.set("products", []) // all products info
global.set("producing", undefined) // present producing info
global.set("ready", [])
global.set("created", []) // order created
global.set("products_produced", []) // products created
return msg;

name: set global
selection
products
update ready
update created
producing
set emerge
func:
flow.set("emerge", msg.payload);
return msg;

name: emerge apply
test
set global producing
get all products
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT oc_order_product.name AS product, oc_order_product.quantity, oc_order_option.value AS procs, oc_order_product.model AS material, oc_order_product.order_id FROM `oc_order_product` LEFT JOIN oc_order_option ON oc_order_option.order_product_id = oc_order_product.order_product_id;"

return msg;

name: set global products
func:
global.set("products", msg.payload)
return msg;

name: updateState
auto
func:
flow.set("auto", msg.payload);
return msg;

name: auto?
func:
msg.payload = flow.get("auto")
return msg;

name: produce
led state
func:
msg.payload = global.get("prd") != undefined
return msg;

name: finish
輸送帶
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload[1] == 1
return msg;

name: 正列
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload[2] == 1
return msg;

name: 龍門
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload[3] == 1
return msg;

name: complete
write option
func:
msg.payload = 1
return msg;

name: query order
出料狀態
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload[6] == 1;
return msg;

name: 出料狀態
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload[7] == 1;
return msg;

name: 出料狀態
func:

name: 出料狀態
func:
